00030 class U_EXPORT UClient_Base {
00031 public:

00034         U_MEMORY_TEST

00038         U_MEMORY_DEALLOCATOR

00040         // SERVICES
00041 
00042         bool isClosed() const
00043                 {
00044                 U_TRACE(0, "UClient_Base::isClosed()")
00045 
00046                 bool result = socket->isClosed();
00047 
00048                 U_RETURN(result);
00049                 }
00050 
00051         bool isConnected() const
00052                 {
00053                 U_TRACE(0, "UClient_Base::isConnected()")
00054 
00055                 bool result = socket->isConnected();
00056 
00057                 U_RETURN(result);
00058                 }
00059 
00060         bool isHttps() const
00061                 {
00062                 U_TRACE(0, "UClient_Base::isHttps()")
00063 
00064                 U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_POINTER(Url::str_https)
00065 
00066                 bool result = (UClient_Base::service == *Url::str_https);
00067 
00068                 U_RETURN(result);
00069                 }
00070 
00071         void reset()
00072                 {
00073                 U_TRACE(0, "UClient_Base::reset()")
00074 
00075                 request.clear();
00076                 }
00077 
00078         void close()
00079                 {
00080                 U_TRACE(0, "UClient_Base::close()")
00081

00085                 }

00087         int                     getPort() const                 { return port; }

00109 
00110         // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00111         // Very simple RPC-like layer
00112         //
00113         // Requests and responses are build of little packets each containing a 4-byte ascii token, an 8-byte hex value or length,
00114         // and optionally data corresponding to the length.
00115         // -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00116 
00117         // Transmit token name (4 characters) and value (32-bit int, as 8 hex characters)
00118 
00119         bool sendTokenInt(const char* token, uint32_t value)
00120                 { buffer.setEmpty(); return URPC::sendTokenInt(socket, token, value, buffer); }
00121 
00122         // Write a token, and then the string data
00123 
00124         bool sendTokenString(const char* token, const UString& data)
00125                 { buffer.setEmpty(); return URPC::sendTokenString(socket, token, data, buffer); }
00126 
00127         // Transmit an vector of string
00128 
00129         bool sendTokenVector(const char* token, UVector<UString>& vec)
00130                 { buffer.setEmpty(); return URPC::sendTokenVector(socket, token, vec, buffer); }
00131 
00132         // Read a token and value
00133 
00134         bool readTokenInt(const char* token)
00135                 { response.setEmpty(); return (URPC::readTokenInt(socket, token, response) > 0); }
00136 
00137         // Read a token, and then the string data
00138 
00139         bool readTokenString(const char* token)
00140                 {
00141                 U_TRACE(0, "UClient_Base::readTokenString(%S)", token)
00142 
00143                 // NB: we force for U_SUBSTR_INC_REF case (string can be referenced more)...
00144 
00145                   buffer.setEmptyForce();
00146                 response.setEmptyForce();
00147 
00148                 if (URPC::readTokenString(socket, token, buffer, response))
00149                         {
00150                         // NB: we force for U_SUBSTR_INC_REF case (string can be referenced more)...
00151 
00152                         buffer.size_adjust_force(U_TOKEN_NM);
00153 
00154                         U_INTERNAL_DUMP("buffer = %.*S response = %.*S)", U_STRING_TO_TRACE(buffer), U_STRING_TO_TRACE(response))
00155 
00156                         U_RETURN(true);
00157                         }
00158 
00159                 U_RETURN(false);
00160                 }
00161 
00162         bool readRPCResponse()
00163                 {
00164                 U_TRACE(0, "UClient_Base::readRPCResponse()")
00165 
00166                 bool result = (this->readTokenString(0) || this->UClient_Base::buffer.empty() == false); 
00167 
00168                 U_RETURN(result);
00169                 }
00170 
00171         // Read an vector of string from the network
00172 
00173         bool readTokenVector(const char* token, UVector<UString>& vec)
00174                 { response.setEmpty(); return URPC::readTokenVector(socket, token, response, vec); }
00175 
00176         // DEBUG
00177 
00178 #ifdef DEBUG
00179         const char* dump(bool reset) const;
00180 #endif
00181 
00182 protected:
00183         USocket* socket;
00184 
00185         int port,                               // the port number to connect to
00186                  verify_mode;           // mode of verification of connection
00187         uint32_t        timeoutMS;      // the time-out value in milliseconds. A zero value indicates that the client will wait forever,
00188                                                                 // or until the underlying operating system decides that the connection cannot be established
00189 
00190         UString server,         // host name or ip address for server
00191                           cert_file,    // locations for certificate of client
00192                           key_file,             // locations for private key of client
00193                           password,             // password  for private key of client
00194                           ca_file,              // locations of trusted CA certificates used in the verification
00195                           ca_path,              // locations of trusted CA certificates used in the verification
00196                           name_sock,    // name file for the listening socket
00197                           log_file,    // locations for file log
00198                           request,
00199                           response,
00200                           buffer,
00201                           service,
00202                           host_port,
00203                           logbuf;
00204 
00205         bool bIPv6;
00206 
00207         static ULog* log;
00208         static int log_file_sz; // memory size for file log
00209 
00210         bool setUrl(const UString& newLocation);
00211 
00212         // COSTRUTTORI
00213 
00214          UClient_Base(UFileConfig* cfg);
00215         ~UClient_Base();
00216 
00217 private:
00218         UClient_Base(const UClient_Base&)                               {}
00219         UClient_Base& operator=(const UClient_Base&) { return *this; }
00220 };
00221 
00222 template <class Socket> class U_EXPORT UClient : virtual public UClient_Base {
00223 public:
00224 
00225         // COSTRUTTORI
00226 
00227         UClient(UFileConfig* cfg) : UClient_Base(cfg)
00228                 {
00229                 U_TRACE_REGISTER_OBJECT(0, UClient, "%p", cfg)
00230 
00231                 socket = U_NEW(Socket(bIPv6));
00232                 }
00233 
00234         ~UClient()
00235                 {
00236                 U_TRACE_UNREGISTER_OBJECT(0, UClient)
00237                 }
00238 
00239         Socket* getSocket() { return (Socket*) socket; }
00240 
00241         // method VIRTUAL to redefine
00242 
00243         bool connect()
00244                 {
00245                 U_TRACE(0, "UClient::connect()")
00246 
00247 #       ifndef U_NO_SSL
00248                 // These are the 1024 bit DH parameters from "Assigned Number for SKIP Protocols"
00249                 // (http://www.skip-vpn.org/spec/numbers.html).
00250                 // See there for how they were generated.
00251 
00252                 getSocket()->useDHFile();
00253 
00254                 // Load our certificate
00255 
00256                 if (getSocket()->setContext(cert_file.c_str(), key_file.c_str(), password.c_str(),
00257                                                                                                 ca_file.c_str(),  ca_path.c_str(), verify_mode) == false)
00258                         {
00259                         U_ERROR("SSL setContext() failed...", 0);
00260                         }
00261 #       endif
00262 
00263                 return UClient_Base::connect();
00264                 }
00265 
00266         // DEBUG
00267 
00268 #ifdef DEBUG
00269         const char* dump(bool reset) const { return UClient_Base::dump(reset); }
00270 #endif
00271 
00272 private:
00273         UClient(const UClient&) : UClient_Base(0) {}
00274         UClient& operator=(const UClient&)        { return *this; }
00275 };
